channel.title: mikarin on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in mikarin on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Yomiuriland with Lin and Mikarin
item.description:
09:13 Saturday 13 April 2019 JST Excited to go to Yomiuriland with Lin and Mikarin today! 21:22 Saturday 13 April 2019 JST Just got back home, though we left Yomiuriland around 5pm. Pretty early from my point of view, but they were both tired. Good times.
Francois on Bandit: Squealing on waterslide:

item.title: Mikarin's piano recital
item.description: 00:07 Tuesday 01 May 2018 JST Mikarin was nearly the headliner for her piano recital today. 21 different performances, and hers was number 19. #21 was done by the two teachers, so it kinda doesn’t even count. Anyway, great job!

item.title: Mikarin's birthday
item.description: 20:30 Sunday 17 May 2015 JST Headed home from Mikarin’s birthday party. Lin’s driving her uncle’s minivan with me, her mom, aunt, and uncle. Mikarin played a nice song on piano and then was like, 自分で作りました、”I wrote it.” Wow! I wonder if she can/should copyright it. She and Takun did a magic show for us, including a couple tricks I wasn’t able to figure out. Takun tried one trick that he wasn’t able to figure out; the die kept showing the same number.
